name: Dilly Rye Boat Dip
author: Beth
summary: This is just your classic bread boat dip, but it will never let you down. Great for parties, or casual get togethers. Corned beef may be used in place of chipped beef, as well as additional celery salt for the Beau Monde seasoning.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) jar dried chipped beef, chopped
directions: Using a bread knife, remove the 'crown' of the bread
Hollow out the inside of the loaf, and cut into bite size cubes for dipping
In a medium bowl, blend sour cream, mayonnaise, chipped beef, Beau Monde seasoning, celery salt, and dill weed
Mix thoroughly, cover, and chill for at least 1 hour
Spoon the chilled dip into the hollow bread loaf, and serve with cubed bread for dipping
